alert.note: Alert for Saline (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 28 at 7:16PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Saline County through 800 PM CDT... At 716 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Smolan, or near Salina, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Salina, Assaria, Smolan, New Cambria and Salina Airport. This includes the following highways... Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 81 and 95. Interstate 70 between Mile Markers 244 and 260. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
